EmailTemplate.subject: Local support in uncertain times: Honeywell Aerospace Trading
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear customer, Airlines in Asia Pacific region are weathering some turbulence and disruptions of raising their revenues this year. With Honeywell you can still get parts quickly and cost effectively. Honeywell Aerospace Trading’s APAC distribution center is located right in the region and stocks a wide range of pre-owned certified parts – both ours and other manufacturers’:
- Auxiliary Power Units - Electronics - Mechanical components - Other line replaceable units
We provide the complete set of line replacement units for Boeing 737NG, 777 and Airbus 320 series aircraft. Save time and money Our stock is in Kuala Lumpur, next to the Honeywell Aerospace APAC HQ. All parts comply with the highest international quality standards and regulations, and you’re also supported by our regional network of repair and overhaul specialists. We offer you and our other APAC customers a convenient location, fast support and parts ready for immediate purchase and despatch. Airlines and other aviation businesses across the region are using us to reduce lead times, decrease inventory levels and minimize downtime. Contact us today <[[mailto:beck.yu@honeywell.com?subject=Honeywell Aerospace Trading]]> to find out more and start to build a better business.
